# hlz

> Zig SDK, CLI, and trading terminal for Hyperliquid. 38 CLI commands, 30 HTTP endpoints, 13 WebSocket subscription types, 62 response types.

## Documentation

- [Getting Started](https://hlz.dev/introduction/getting-started): Install and first commands
- [Installation](https://hlz.dev/introduction/installation): Pre-built binaries, build from source, Zig dependency
- [Configuration](https://hlz.dev/introduction/configuration): Keys, environment variables, config file

## CLI

- [CLI Overview](https://hlz.dev/cli): 38 commands, pipe-aware output, exit codes
- [Market Data](https://hlz.dev/cli/market-data): price, mids, funding, book, perps, spot, dexes
- [Trading](https://hlz.dev/cli/trading): buy, sell, cancel, modify, leverage, twap, batch
- [Account](https://hlz.dev/cli/account): portfolio, positions, orders, fills, balance
- [Transfers](https://hlz.dev/cli/transfers): send tokens between addresses and contexts
- [Streaming](https://hlz.dev/cli/streaming): WebSocket real-time data streams
- [Key Management](https://hlz.dev/cli/keys): Encrypted keystore management
- [Agent Integration](https://hlz.dev/cli/agent-integration): AI agent and automation guide

## SDK

- [SDK Overview](https://hlz.dev/sdk): Module structure, quick example, design principles
- [HTTP Client](https://hlz.dev/sdk/client): 30 endpoints, typed responses
- [Signing](https://hlz.dev/sdk/signing): RMP and EIP-712 paths
- [WebSocket](https://hlz.dev/sdk/websocket): 13 subscription types, protocol details
- [Types](https://hlz.dev/sdk/types): OrderRequest, BatchOrder, response types
- [Decimal Math](https://hlz.dev/sdk/decimal): 38-digit precision arithmetic

## Terminal

- [Trading Terminal](https://hlz.dev/terminal): Features, architecture
- [Keybindings](https://hlz.dev/terminal/keybindings): Navigation, timeframes, market switching

## Guides

- [Building a Trading Bot](https://hlz.dev/guides/trading-bot): Shell and Zig SDK examples
- [Streaming Market Data](https://hlz.dev/guides/streaming): Real-time data pipelines
- [Agent Payments](https://hlz.dev/guides/agent-payments): Free instant transfers for AI agents

## Reference

- [CLI Commands](https://hlz.dev/reference/cli): Complete command reference
- [SDK API](https://hlz.dev/reference/sdk): All client methods and response types
- [TUI Framework](https://hlz.dev/reference/tui): Buffer, Layout, List, Chart API
- [WebSocket Protocol](https://hlz.dev/reference/websocket): Subscription messages and data formats
- [Benchmarks](https://hlz.dev/benchmarks): Performance data

## Credits

Inspired by [hypersdk](https://github.com/infinitefield/hypersdk) (Rust SDK), [hyperliquid-cli](https://github.com/chrisling-dev/hyperliquid-cli) (TypeScript CLI), and [zabi](https://github.com/Raiden1411/zabi) (Zig Ethereum tooling).
